description: Rules for recovering and resuming tasks after interruptions
content:
# Resumption Rules

## State Recovery
- Load last known state
- Verify task status
- Check progress
- Review decisions
- Update security status

## Context Recovery
- Load environment state
- Verify tool versions
- Check dependencies
- Validate configurations
- Update documentation

## Progress Recovery
- Review progress.md
- Check completed steps
- Verify next steps
- Update status
- Document recovery

## Security Recovery
- Verify security state
- Check vulnerabilities
- Update security status
- Review permissions
- Document changes
